publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4482 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: Cross-cutting Expenditure Review of Deprivation—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Finance Committee’s 5th Report, 2006 (Session 2): Cross-cutting Expenditure Review of Deprivation (SP paper 536).
